name: For the Crown
description:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of "For the Crown"!
Choose the perfect location for your settlement and lay the foundation for your thriving town.
Construct buildings, master the art of resource combination, and engineer a well-connected network to drive your economy and shape a majestic kingdom.

Expand your city's borders, but remember to plan ahead to prevent any road network disasters.
With strategic foresight and wise decision-making, you'll forge a glorious empire.

Are you prepared to dedicate yourself to the service of your kingdom?
Are you ready to rise and conquer "For the Crown"?
